description: Working on various projects mostly in JavaScript ecosystem (Node, Angular, React...) and WordPress. You can find me on most freelance plateforms
Specialized on offline system, we offer to our customers solutions to get online content without the need of active Internet. Solution available for both individuals and organizations.
Working on a project to digitalize education
As a consultant in this higher education intitution, I managed the computing lab and administrated the LAN. Among other activities, I assisted lectures and students in their computing needs.
Wanting to help others be present on Internet, I founded this web design agency specialized in WordPress sites building to help schools or universities to order websites at a convenient price.
Managing all about compiting, from network administration to computer maintenance, and teaching CS to pupils and other teachers.

Having gained a much more experience in computing and customer care, I launched this service for those who wanted to independantly work with me. Among my clients: University of Kisangani (CSB), INPP...
Leading and mentoring the team of computing, I worked on various projects within the organization including but not limited to training, computer maintenance and network administration
